card.name: Expressroid
card.description: When this card is Summoned: You can target 2 "roid" monsters in your GY, except "Expressroid"; add those targets to your hand.

card.name: Cyber-Tech Alligator
card.description: Originally a pterodactyl, he was viciously attacked by a dragon. Using the newest technologies, his keeper saved him from near-fatal wounds and brought him back as a powerful Cyborg.

card.name: Robotic Knight
card.description: The Commander of Machine-Types, he serves the Machine King. He is famous for the way he controls his troops.

card.name: Dark Blade
card.description: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

card.name: Acrobat Monkey
card.description: An autonomous monkey type robot which was developed with cutting-edge technology. It moves very acrobatically.

card.name: Archfiend Soldier
card.description: An expert at battle who belongs to a crack diabolical unit. He's famous because he always gets the job done.

card.name: Cycroid
card.description: The most lovable and friendly of all the Vehicroids. It can arm itself with training wheels!

card.name: Jerry Beans Man
card.description: Jerry, a bean soldier, believes he is the strongest warrior in the world, but his true abilities are still untested.

card.name: Zure, Knight of Dark World
card.description: The name of this illustrious knight is known by all residents of Dark World. He never oppresses the commoners.

card.name: Poison Mummy
card.description: FLIP: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Mask of Darkness
card.description: FLIP: Target 1 Trap in your GY; add that target to your hand.

card.name: Dekoichi the Battlechanted Locomotive
card.description: FLIP: Draw 1 card, then draw 1 additional card for each face-up "Bokoichi the Freightening Car" you control.

card.name: Chiron the Mage
card.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell Card, then target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Patroid
card.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can look at 1 face-down card your opponent controls, then return it to its original position.

card.name: Gyroid
card.description: Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle.

card.name: Steamroid
card.description: If this card attacks an opponent's monster, this card gains 500 ATK during the Damage Step only. If this card is attacked by an opponent's monster, this card loses 500 ATK during the Damage Step only.

card.name: Drillroid
card.description: Before damage calculation, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster.

card.name: Submarineroid
card.description: This card can attack your opponent directly, but when it does so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is the original ATK of this card. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked or was attacked: You can change this card to Defense Position.

card.name: Ambulanceroid
card.description: When a "roid" monster is added from your Graveyard to your hand, you can Special Summon that monster.

card.name: Rescueroid
card.description: When a "roid" monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can return that monster to its owner's hand.

card.name: Abaki
card.description: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by battle, both players take 500 damage.

card.name: Black Pendant
card.description: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Rush Recklessly
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

card.name: Giant Trunade
card.description: Return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the hand.

card.name: Heavy Storm
card.description: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

card.name: Book of Moon
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; change that target to face-down Defense Position.

card.name: Smashing Ground
card.description: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the highest DEF (your choice, if tied).

card.name: Enemy Controller
card.description: Activate 1 of these effects.●Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position.●Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.

card.name: Earthquake
card.description: Change all face-up monsters on the field to Defense Position.

card.name: A Feather of the Phoenix
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 card in your GY; return that target to the top of your Deck.

card.name: Lightning Vortex
card.description: Discard 1 card; destroy all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

card.name: Brain Control
card.description: Pay 800 LP, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that can be Normal Summoned/Set; take control of that target until the End Phase.

card.name: Trap Hole
card.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Magic Jammer
card.description: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
card.description: When a Trap Card is activated: Pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Sakuretsu Armor
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Threatening Roar
card.description: Your opponent cannot declare an attack this turn.

card.name: Negate Attack
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.

card.name: Magic Cylinder
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

card.name: Rising Energy
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; that target gains 1500 ATK until the End Phase.

card.name: Supercharge
card.description: When your opponent declares an attack while the only monsters you control are Machine-Type "roid" monster(s): Draw 2 cards.
